There are $n$ pens. Each pen has a certain amount of ink.  

On each day of the week, a specific pen is used. On Monday, pen 1 is used, on Tuesday, pen 2 is used, and so on. On Sunday, no pens are used.

Each day a pen is used, 1 milliliter of ink is consumed, except on Sunday.

Determine which pen will run out of ink first. 


Input:

* The first line contains the number of pens, $n$.
* The second line contains $n$ numbers, where each number represents the initial amount of ink in a pen.

Output:

* Print the index (number) of the pen that will run out of ink first.

You are given a list of numbers representing the amount of ink in each of several pens.  Pens are used in a repeating cycle (pen 1, pen 2, pen 3, ...). On weekdays, each pen uses 1 unit of ink. On weekends, no ink is used. Determine which pen will run out of ink first.
